body:
Hi Mostapha and Chris,  I built curved geometries, just similar as you did in tutorials, and try to run an energy simulation test on it under default "energySimPar" settings. Finally it gave me a warning:  1. The simulation has not run correctly because of this severe error:
** Severe ** Problem in interior solar distribution calculation (CHKBKS) the models are quite simple without "L" shape zones. so I try to set "0" to the "solarDistribution_" of  "energySimPar" and run it again. this time the "exportToOpenStudio" component didn't gave any error or warning, but the readEPResult component shows that it didn't work. I have no idea what could be the reason. Is it an energyplus problem or a openstudio problem or an honeybee problem? how to deal with it? Thank you very much in advance! Best, GUO [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zuNdr-kLfKVaA8XKrWRUmJ31qo7jlOyQBZGRDI0urHIW20Zf9GPZ2eBwr32uuBHH*5IGh05izlFR37zGVuTW5-dGHsW9dScv/8.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zuNdr-kLfKUKaPma7-fUt7Xtw8FN*S73G2YHwxTanLvKv4tosVHSyNmWuyltkJWWAnEi7Hvxp41wWIsZLn4Zy0Vl8dNv0T8c/10.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zuNdr-kLfKXY3W8WNO-ZhR5QMCdldET0vg*9i8Z3nUdujDMUKewB2u4R4IagH0*SSUTB-Is5LQOOGd-RY67XZGDloz-C6w23/QQ20170503180232.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zuNdr-kLfKXxDacb9bAJKvV5pPXim4-QksaRpqL0AMvpPiX1T*PiLH7xyTP7l4H3IxXQwSIxujozXDPdkWBdKMPFqRqGS0UQ/QQ20170503180319.jpg)
topic: "exportToOpenStudio" component didn't work for curved geometry
